content: Question. Shouldn't it be possible to create a CI job which creates dumps of dataverse-sample-data as Postgres SQL dumps? And I'm specifically talking about exporting the datasets / collections only, not users etc. Could be snapshots for released versions, too. Just to make the procedure of creating a larger install for testing/benchmarking faster than imports (which are very slow)
Sure, sounds good. What about the data files? Place them on disk? Or don't worry about them?
I'm kind of thinking we maybe could provide some images with them... Maybe that's the easiest way to ship them.
As well as shipping images for Postgres and Solr
Images with data files. Sure, sounds good.
